title: Ticket #1244: Add gahp server functionality to shadow for HFC work
description: When tasks are finished processing in the HFC universe, their results will need to be processed by a user provided results processing applications. This application will interface with the shadow using a modified gahp protocol. The shadow will stream results to the processing application using the gahp protocol. The result data will be in the form of a classad.
creator: jshill4
